mapper.select: select task_id, task_name, task_type, start_time, end_time, dept_id, dept_name, executor, domain_type, task_status, task_content, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete from task where task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into task(task_name, task_type, start_time, end_time, dept_id, dept_name, executor, domain_type, task_status, task_content, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values (#{taskName}, #{taskType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{executor}, #{domainType}, #{taskStatus}, #{taskContent}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delete})

insert into task(task_name, task_type, start_time, end_time, dept_id, dept_name, executor, domain_type, task_status, task_content, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.taskName}, #{entity.taskType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.executor}, #{entity.domainType}, #{entity.taskStatus}, #{entity.taskContent}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})

insert into task(task_name, task_type, start_time, end_time, dept_id, dept_name, executor, domain_type, task_status, task_content, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.taskName}, #{entity.taskType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.executor}, #{entity.domainType}, #{entity.taskStatus}, #{entity.taskContent}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})
on duplicate key update task_name = values(task_name), task_type = values(task_type), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), dept_id = values(dept_id), dept_name = values(dept_name), executor = values(executor), domain_type = values(domain_type), task_status = values(task_status), task_content = values(task_content), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), delete = values(delete)
mapper.update:
update task
task_name = #{taskName},
task_type = #{taskType},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
dept_id = #{deptId},
dept_name = #{deptName},
executor = #{executor},
domain_type = #{domainType},
task_status = #{taskStatus},
task_content = #{taskContent},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
delete = #{delete},
where task_id = #{taskId}
